thread.title: LeBron James makes cameo on Survivor's Remorse Saturday
thread.title_full: LeBron James makes cameo on Survivor's Remorse Saturday | cleveland.com

author: Joe Vardon, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: LeBron James makes cameo on Survivor's Remorse Saturday
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- LeBron James will make his first cameo on Survivor's Remorse Saturday, but will he even watch it live?
James plays himself in an episode of the Starz cable show on which he normally serves a co-executive producer. The show airs at 9:30 p.m.
During that same time Saturday night, James' beloved Ohio State Buckeyes will be playing football against Penn State on ABC. James will be with the Cavaliers in Toronto then in preparation for Sunday's preseason game, though he will not play .
Also making a cameo in Survivor's Remorse is Boston Red Sox chairman and James business partner Tom Werner, who is also a co-executive producer on the show. In the episode, James and Werner are among those participating in a high-stakes card game.
You can watch a clip of the show here .
